display_long_description:
Discover EcoQuestVR - the mixed reality application that makes waste sorting both fun and educational! In this immersive game, you have to sort the waste arriving on a conveyor belt by placing it in the appropriate bins. Choose between two exciting game modes: training and challenge.

In training mode, perfect your sorting skills with no time limit, ideal for learning to recognise the different types of waste. In challenge mode, face the pressure of time, with every mistake costing you precious seconds. The aim is to sort as quickly and efficiently as possible.

At the end of each session, compare your scores on the scoreboard to see how you measure up against your friends and other players. Join the ecological adventure with EcoQuestVR and become a true champion of selective sorting while contributing to a greener future!
